results.title: Palbociclib in combination with simvastatin induce severe rhabdomyolysis: a case report
results.text_hl: We present a @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ that developed severe @DISEASE_Rhabdomyolysis @DISEASE_MESH:D012206 @@@rhabdomyolysis@@@ with @DISEASE_Mood_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D019964 @@@tetra-affection@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Gait_Ataxia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020234 @@@loss of gait@@@ after initiating the first cycle of @CHEMICAL_palbociclib @CHEMICAL_MESH:C500026 @@@Palbociclib@@@ concomitantly with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ 40 mg treatment.

citations.NLM: Nersesjan V, Hansen K, Krag T, Duno M, Jeppesen TD. Palbociclib in combination with simvastatin induce severe rhabdomyolysis: a case report BMC Neurol. 2019 Oct 22;19(1):247. PMID: 31640597
citations.BibTeX: @article{31640597, title={Palbociclib in combination with simvastatin induce severe rhabdomyolysis: a case report}, author={Nersesjan V and Hansen K and Krag T and Duno M and Jeppesen TD}, journal={BMC Neurol}, volume={19}, number={1}, pages={247}}

results.title: [Cerebrotendinous xanthomatosis].
results.text_hl: HISTORY AND CLINICAL FINDINGS: A 43-year-old @SPECIES_9606 @@@woman@@@ had since childhood suffered from progressive @DISEASE_Dementia @DISEASE_MESH:D003704 @@@dementia@@@. @<m>DISEASE_Gait_Ataxia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020234 @@@Gait ataxia@@@ and mild @DISEASE_Polyneuropathies @DISEASE_MESH:D011115 @@@polyneuropathy@@@ were noted in the neurological examination.

citations.NLM: Burghaus L, Liu W, Haupt WF. [Cerebrotendinous xanthomatosis]. Dtsch Med Wochenschr. 2007 Jul 29;132(27):1463-6. PMID: 17583829
